Develop a bartering system that allows people to trade goods and services directly without the use of money.
Create a platform that connects people with similar skills or interests to trade services or goods.
Establish a system of local exchange trading that allows communities to trade goods and services within their own networks.
Develop a system that allows people to trade goods and services based on their own personal values and beliefs.
Create a platform that connects people with sustainable and environmentally-friendly products and services to trade.
